results.text_hl: Furthermore, both @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@ and @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ exhibited a significantly lower risk of @<m>DISEASE_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group than in other groups.
